name: T-Runnex
description:
T-Runnex is a platform/runner game located between the Cretaceous and Jurassic periods.

Have fun running, jumping, bouncing and throwing fireballs at other dinosaurs.
Try not to fall or bump into other dinosaurs; T-Runnex is strong, but be careful...

T-Runnex loves bones, try to collect all of them in each level!

Now compatible with Gamepad !!

What are you waiting for to play this Jurassic adventure?

CONTROLS:
-Jump: space-Fireball: right click
